dcterms:creator: D. S. Yeager
P. Hanselman
G. M. Walton
J. S. Murray
R. Crosnoe
C. Muller
E. Tipton
B. Schneider
C. S. Hulleman
C. P. Hinojosa
dcterms:description: A national experiment that reveals where a growth mindset improves achievement, providing insights into the impact of mindset interventions on educational outcomes.
dcterms:title: National Study of Learning Mindsets (NLSM)

dcterms:creator: D. Arkhangelsky
S. Athey
D. A. Hirshberg
G. W. Imbens
S. Wager
dcterms:description: A method for estimating causal effects using a synthetic control approach that allows for the comparison of treated and control groups over time.
dcterms:title: Synthetic difference in differences

dcterms:creator: S. Wager
S. Athey
dcterms:description: A statistical method for estimating and inferring heterogeneous treatment effects using random forests, providing a flexible approach to causal inference.
dcterms:title: Causal Forest

dcterms:creator: S. R. Künzel
J. S. Sekhon
P. J. Bickel
B. Yu
dcterms:description: A framework for estimating heterogeneous treatment effects using machine learning techniques, providing a meta-learning approach to causal inference.
dcterms:title: X-learner

dcterms:creator: H. A. Chipman
E. I. George
R. E. McCulloch
dcterms:description: A Bayesian approach to regression modeling that combines the flexibility of regression trees with the principles of Bayesian inference.
dcterms:title: Bayesian Additive Regression Trees (BART)

dcterms:creator: S. Athey
J. Tibshirani
S. Wager
dcterms:description: A method for generalizing random forests to allow for the estimation of heterogeneous treatment effects, enhancing the applicability of random forests in causal inference.
dcterms:title: Generalized Random Forests

dcterms:creator: S. R. Künzel
S. Tang
L. Xie
T. Saarinen
P. J. Bickel
B. Yu
J. S. Sekhon
dcterms:description: A toolbox for causal inference that emphasizes heterogeneous treatment effect estimation, providing a suite of tools for researchers.
dcterms:title: Causal Toolbox
